00041 
00042 MinimumDragProblem::MinimumDragProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)
00043 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00044 {                     
00045    // Control sentence
00046 
00047    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00048    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00049 
00050    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 1)
00051    {
00052       std::cerr << std::endl
00053                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00054                 << "MinimumDragProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00055                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1." << std::endl
00056                 << std::endl;
00057 
00058       exit(1);
00059    }
00060 
00061    tolerance = 1.0e-6;
00062    initialSize = 1000;
00063 
00064    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00065    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00066 }
00067

00131 
00132 void MinimumDragProblem::setTolerance(double newTolerance)
00133 {
00134    // Control sentence
00135 
00136    if(newTolerance <= 0.0)
00137    {
00138       std::cerr << std::endl
00139                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00140                 << "void setTolerance(double) method." << std::endl
00141                 << "The tolerance of integration must be greater than zero." << std::endl
00142                 << std::endl;
00143 
00144       exit(1);
00145    }
00146 
00147    // Set tolerance 
00148 
00149    tolerance = newTolerance;
00150 
00151    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00152 }

00173 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>) method
00174 
00184 
00185 Vector<double> MinimumDragProblem::calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double> input)
00186 {
00187    // Control sentence
00188 
00189    int size = input.getSize();
00190 
00191    if(size != 1)
00192    {
00193       std::cerr << std::endl
00194                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00195                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00196                 << "Size of input must be 1." << std::endl
00197                 << std::endl;
00198 
00199       exit(1);
00200    }
00201 
00202    // Calculate particular solution
00203 
00204    Vector<double> particularSolution(1);
00205 
00206    double x = input[0];
00207 
00208    double xa = 0.0;
00209    double ya = 0.0;
00210 
00211    double xb = 1.0;
00212    double yb = 1.0;
00213 
00214    particularSolution[0] = ya + (yb-ya)*(x-xa)/(xb-xa);
00215 
00216    return(particularSolution);
00217 }

00220 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>)
00221 
00231 
00232 Vector<double> MinimumDragProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double> input)
00233 {
00234    // Control sentence
00235 
00236    int size = input.getSize();
00237 
00238    if(size != 1)
00239    {
00240       std::cerr << std::endl
00241                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00242                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00243                 << "Size of input must be 1." << std::endl
00244                 << std::endl;
00245 
00246       exit(1);
00247    }
00248 
00249    // Calculate homogeneous solution
00250 
00251    Vector<double> homogeneousSolution(1);
00252 
00253    double x = input[0];
00254 
00255    double xa = 0.0;
00256    double xb = 1.0;
00257 
00258    homogeneousSolution[0] = (x-xa)*(x-xb);
00259 
00260    return(homogeneousSolution);
00261 }

00264 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)
00265 
00274 
00275 Vector<double> MinimumDragProblem::calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00276 {
00277    // Control sentence
00278 
00279    int size = input.getSize();
00280 
00281    if(size != 1)
00282    {
00283       std::cerr << std::endl
00284                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00285                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00286                 << "Size of input must be 1." << std::endl
00287                 << std::endl;
00288 
00289       exit(1);
00290    }
00291 
00292    // Calculate particular solution derivative
00293 
00294    Vector<double> particularSolutionDerivative(1);
00295    
00296    double xa = 0.0;
00297    double ya = 0.0;
00298 
00299    double xb = 1.0;
00300    double yb = 1.0;
00301 
00302    particularSolutionDerivative[0] = (yb-ya)/(xb-xa);
00303 
00304    return(particularSolutionDerivative);
00305 }

00309 
00318 
00319 Vector<double> MinimumDragProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00320 {
00321    // Control sentence
00322 
00323    int size = input.getSize();
00324 
00325    if(size != 1)
00326    {
00327       std::cerr << std::endl
00328                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00329                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivatibe(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00330                 << "Size of input must be 1." << std::endl
00331                 << std::endl;
00332 
00333       exit(1);
00334    }
00335 
00336    // Calculate particular solution
00337 
00338    Vector<double> homogeneousSolutionDerivative(1);
00339 
00340    double x = input[0];
00341 
00342    double xa = 0.0;
00343    double xb = 1.0;
00344 
00345    homogeneousSolutionDerivative[0] = (x-xa) + (x-xb);
00346 
00347    return(homogeneousSolutionDerivative);
00348 }

00350 
00351 // double getDragIntegrand(void) method
00352 
00359 
00360 double MinimumDragProblem::getDragIntegrand(double x, double dummy)
00361 {
00362    double dragIntegrand = 0.0;
00363 
00364    Vector<double> input(1, x);
00365 
00366    // Get output
00367 
00368    Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00369 
00370    double y = output[0];
00371 
00372    // Get output derivative 
00373 
00374    Matrix<double> jacobian = multilayerPerceptron->calculateJacobian(input, *this);
00375   
00376    double dydx = jacobian[0][0];
00377 
00378    if(y < 0.0)
00379    {
00380       y = 0.0;
00381       dydx = 0.0;
00382    }
00383    else if(y > 1.0)
00384    {
00385       y = 1.0;
00386       dydx = 0.0;
00387    }
00388    
00389    dragIntegrand = y*pow(dydx,3); 
00390  
00391    return(dragIntegrand);       
00392 }
00393 
00394 
00395 // double getDrag(void) method
00396 
00402 
00403 double MinimumDragProblem::getDrag(void)
00404 {
00405    double drag = 0.0;
00406 
00407    Vector<double> x;
00408    Vector<double> y;
00409 
00410    int numberOfPoints = ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this,
00411    x, y, 
00412    &MinimumDragProblem::getDragIntegrand,
00413    0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00414 
00415    drag = y[numberOfPoints-1];
00416    
00417    return(drag);
00418 }

00421 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00422 
00424 
00425 double MinimumDragProblem::calculateEvaluation(void)
00426 {
00427     // Control sentence 
00428 
00429    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00430    {
00431       std::cerr << std::endl
00432                 << "Flood Error: MinimumDragProblem class." << std::endl
00433                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00434                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00435                 << std::endl;
00436 
00437       exit(1);
00438    }
00439 
00440    double evaluation = 0.0;
00441 
00442    // Increment number of objective functional evaluations
00443 
00444    numberOfEvaluations++;
00445 
00446    double drag = getDrag();
00447    
00448    evaluation = drag; 
00449 
00450    return(evaluation);
00451 }

00454 // void saveResults(char*) method
00455 
00465 
00466 void MinimumDragProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00467 {
00468    std::fstream file; 
00469 
00470    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00471 
00472    if(!file.is_open())
00473    {
00474       std::cout << std::endl
00475                 << "Cannot open minimum drag problem results data file."
00476                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00477 
00478       exit(1);
00479    }
00480    else
00481    {
00482       if(display)
00483       {
00484          std::cout << std::endl
00485                    << "Saving minimum drag problem results to data file..."
00486                    << std::endl;
00487       }
00488    }
00489 
00490    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Minimum drag problem results data file." << std::endl
00491         << "% Column data:" << std::endl
00492         << "% 1 - Independent variable (x)" << std::endl
00493         << "% 2 - Dependent variable (x)" << std::endl;
00494         
00495    Vector<double> input(1);
00496    Vector<double> output(1);
00497 
00498    double x = 0.0;
00499    double y = 0.0;
00500         
00501    int numberOfPoints = 1001;
00502 
00503    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00504    {
00505       x = (double)i/(double)(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00506       
00507       input[0] = x;
00508       
00509       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00510 
00511       y = output[0];
00512 
00513       if(y < 0.0)
00514       {
00515          y = 0.0;
00516       } 
00517       else if(y > 1.0)
00518       {
00519          y = 1.0;
00520       }
00521      
00522       file << x << " " << y << std::endl;
00523    }                
00524 
00525    file.close();
00526 }
